column2: *The ship's alert system goes off. Gordon is calling you again. Apparently, those two things are connected.* Captain! *Gordon is almost shouting, his lips are trembling slightly.* Urgent! Abandon system, abandon system!!

The star is dying!! Exploding! Expanding!!! *Gordon is waving his hands, and from there on he only speaks in scientific mumbo jumbo: something about the Hertzsprung-Russel diagram, pulsars, black holes... What goddamned language is he speaking? Although, all you need to hear is the last sentence.* ...there won't even be stardust left over from us!
Damn it! Gordon, over and out. On second thought…  hold on. Maybe I'll need you again.
